mapper.select: select id, pwd, name, email, sex, place from MEMBER where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (id, pwd, name, email, sex, place) VALUES (#{id} ,#{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{place})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET pwd=#{pwd}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, sex=#{sex}, place=#{place} where id=#{id}
